ValidationRule.description: If the account record type is Vendor or Competitor, the Lead Source is not required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
NOT ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Record_Type__c, "Vendor"), ISPICKVAL(Record_Type__c, "Competitor") ) ), (Date_Created__c) > DATE(2018,01,01), ISBLANK(TEXT(Lead_Source__c)) ) && $Setup.rh2__PS_Settings__c.rh2__Run_Validation_Rule__c && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead Source is a required field on Account records. Please add the appropriate Lead Source value to the Account record in order to proceed.
